title: I think im done with lol
body:
I try to play, be a friendly player, don't rage etc. But all I ever find is that for some reason, Good knows whatever, I almost always lose, and as much as I try to see it as my fault, sometimes I honestly don't even understand. The community itself is basically a bunch of flamers screaming at others over their own mistakes, which makes everyone feel worse and as a result play worse. I try to play with friends.... it doesn't get much better there. Idek, I used to love this game, played it everyday from season 2 , I tried to get to gold, silver 1 close :P, I didn't make it but I was still satisfied. It's just kinda hard to let go of a game you've played for years.
I'm probably going to get so much downvote for this, but I don't think I can return until the game improves

replies.body:
Why are you bothering to be nice? Everytime I try and be nice I lose.
Fuck that shit, just be yourself.

These posts irritate me like no other, you think your enemy are getting gem of players every time? It's a 50/50 chance, so therefore if you are so called "playing properly and it's never your fault" you should be climbing, if it's not the case, then guess what buddy, smell the roses, it's your fault. Now sure there are games with trolls and feeders those happen, you brush that off as impossible to win, but the same goes to your enemy. 

Now stop your dumb ass qq'ing, be reasonable, and get improving.

People are gonna see your post as being an asshole, just sayin, i don't see it that way cause i'm not a little kid i can take truth unlike some people, but i agree with you, i find it incredibly stupid when people make posts about being stuck in low elo and whatnot, like for real the problem is you and no one else, if you weren't the problem you wouldn't be where you are now and that's just fact and nobody can hide from this.

I find climbing hilariously easy, hell give me a bronze V account and ill get it out of there into lets say gold in just a few days whereas it takes other people years and those people just sit there and complain blaming other people and not themselves.

Some people need to drink some cement and harden the fuck up.

Get me into gold and you will find me back at bronze

so ill just sit and play the min games and hope im still gold by the end of the season
Then the problem is you and only you so get better or you'll find yourself stuck in low elo forever.
Dw, im not being defeated, I have simply accepted that I will be bronze and I will stay there if I choose not to work at it
Although im technically not in bronze yet my chances are not good

Found your problem, you're not good at this game, get better and carry its that simple, you've been playing this long and still in Silver yet you wonder why you experience these sorts of games, like for real if you just got better at the game and muted the fuckers that pissed you off you would find this game a lot better.

Don't get mad i'm just being honest with ya, i carried a large amount of my games by spamming Rengar and in doing so people see i'm a Rengar main and i know what i'm doing, less flame, better experience playing this game, i do get the occasional idiot that thinks i'm bad and he's some godlike player but i just take a look at my stats then his and i laugh, mute button is strong my friend, use it.
